metadata.title: USN-5327-1 -- rsh vulnerability
metadata.description: Hiroyuki Yamamori discovered that rsh incorrectly handled certain filenames. If a user or automated system were tricked into connecting to a malicious rsh server, a remote attacker could possibly use this issue to modify directory permissions.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5327-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  rsh-server - 0.17-17ubuntu0.1 rsh-client - 0.17-17ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
